decks.notes: This deck revolves around using creatures with various abilities to create a toolbox of options for different situations. By using cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Chord of Calling, the deck can search for and utilize key creatures like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons to generate advantage. The deck also features a sacrifice theme with cards like Blood Artist and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to control the board. Overall, the deck aims to be flexible and adaptive, utilizing a variety of creatures to create powerful synergies and win conditions.

This deck focuses on utilizing the synergy between Amulet of Vigor and The One Ring to quickly ramp up mana and play powerful combo pieces like Primeval Titan. By using cards like Arboreal Grazer and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove to ensure consistent land drops, the deck aims to assemble a lethal combination of lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Vesuva to deal massive damage to the opponent. The key strategy is to efficiently tutor for the necessary pieces with cards like Summoner's Pact and Expedition Map, leading to explosive plays and overwhelming board presence.

This deck focuses on using cards like Indomitable Creativity and Transmogrify to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty early in the game. The deck also utilizes cards like Persist and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate additional value and card advantage. With a mix of removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push, as well as disruption like Thoughtseize, the deck aims to control the board until it can assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures. The deck's strategy revolves around creativity and innovation to achieve victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Grief, along with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize to apply early pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, the deck features powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Terminate to close out the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Orcish Bowmasters provide additional utility and flexibility to adapt to different situations during the game.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game through counter spells, removal, and card advantage while utilizing The One Ring as a win condition. The deck focuses on controlling the board and the opponent's hand with cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Time Raveler, while also having answers to threats with cards like Prismatic Ending and Supreme Verdict. The deck also includes utility lands like Geier Reach Sanitarium and Minamo, School at Water's Edge to further its control strategy. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a control mirror match.

This deck focuses on assembling the Heliod and Spike Feeder combo to gain infinite life and create an infinitely large creature. Auriok Champion and Ranger-Captain of Eos help protect the combo pieces, while Collected Company allows for additional card advantage and potential combo pieces to be found. Utopia Sprawl and Arbor Elf help ramp into the combo quickly, with Skyclave Apparition providing removal and disruption. The deck also includes some utility lands and additional creatures to support the combo strategy and ensure its success.

Utilizing the synergy between lands that produce multiple mana and the ability to untap them, the Amulet Titan deck aims to quickly ramp into its powerful finishers, Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. By utilizing Amulet of Vigor to untap lands when they enter the battlefield, the deck can generate large amounts of mana to cast these high-impact threats ahead of schedule. The deck also utilizes the land recursion ability of Vesuva and Tolaria West to further enhance its land-based ramp strategy, allowing for explosive turns that can quickly overwhelm opponents.
